Happy Diwali!

Nov 9, 2007

It’s getting to be crunch time for the postcard project if I am going to get everything ready for India in January. To get everything coordinated, I have been in touch with DLR Prerna, the NGO in Darjeeling that I worked with my first trip there. Last night, I got an email from a colleague there wishing me Happy Diwali. Of course I had to go look it up. I delight in being offered greetings so far outside of my daily reality from people I’ve had very good times with. Happy Diwali!
